    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static AbstractTokenizer createInstance(java.lang.String type)
        Factory method for creating instances of tokenizers.
        Parameters:
        type - the name of the tokenizer type Following types are available:
        • basicTokenizer
        • classifyingTokenizer
        Returns:
        a handle to a dynamically created tokenizer

      • produceWhitespaceTokens

        public void produceWhitespaceTokens()
        Switches on the option of producing tokens representing whitespace sequences.

      • ignoreWhitespaceTokens

        public void ignoreWhitespaceTokens()
        Switches off the option of producing tokens representing whitespace sequences. This is the default setting.

      • producesWhitespaceTokens

        public boolean producesWhitespaceTokens()
        Checks whether tokenizer produces tokens representing whitespace sequences.
        Returns:
        true if tokens representing whitespace sequences are produced, or false otherwise.

      • tokenize

        public java.util.ArrayList<AbstractTokenItem> tokenize(java.lang.String inputText)
        Tokenizes a given input text.
        Parameters:
        inputText - a string representing the input text
        Returns:
        an array list of token items objects representing the tokens

      • tokenize

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<AbstractTokenItem> tokenize(char[] inputText)
        Tokenizes a given input text.
        Parameters:
        inputText - a character array representing the input text
        Returns:
        an array of AbstractTokenInfo objects representing the tokens

      • getTypeNames

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.Byte,java.lang.String> getTypeNames()
        Return a mapping 'token ID' map to: string representation.
        Returns:
        a mapping of token type IDs to their string representation
